displayName.french: Tu me fais tourner la tête

description.english: Do a 360 one hand table, 360 barspin to table and a barspin to icepick in one run.
description.german: Abs. in einer Fahrt e. 360 One Hand Table, e. 360 Barspin zu Table und e. Barspin zu Icepick.
description.french: Exécutez un 360 one hand table, un 360 barspin to table et un barspin to icepick en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un 360 one hand table, un 360 a table y un barspin a icepick en una carrera.
description.russian: Сделать 360 + однорукий тейбл, 360 + барспин на тейбл и барспин на ледокол за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a tailwhip, no hander and a toothpick in one run.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen Tailwhip, einen No Hander und einen Toothpick.
description.french: Exécutez un tailwhip, un No Hander et un toothpick en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un tailwhip, un no hander y un toothpick en una carrera.
description.russian: Сделать тейлвип, ноухенд и туспик за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a 360, a 50-50 and a barspin to tailwhip in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un 360, un 50-50 et un barspin to tailwhip en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un 360, un 50-50 y un barspin a tailwhip en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen 360, einen 50-50 und einen Barspin zu Tailwhip.
description.russian: Сделать 360, 50-50 и барспин на тейлвип за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do an oppo 360 turndown, a no hander to toboggan and a 720 in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un oppo 360 turndown, un no hander to toboggan et un 720 en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un oppo 360 turndown, un no hander a toboggan y un 720 en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen Oppo 360 Turndown, einen No Hander zu Toboggan und einen 720.
description.russian: Сделать оппозит 360 + терндаун, ноухенд на тобогган и 720 за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a tailwhip, nac-nac and a turndown in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un tailwhip, un nac-nac et un turndown en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un tailwhip, un nac-nac y un turndown en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen Tailwhip, einen Nac-Nac und einen Turndown.
description.russian: Сделать тейлвип, нак-нак и терндаун за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a superman, 360 darkside and a barspin to tailwhip in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un superman, un 360 darkside et un barspin to tailwhip en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un superman, un 360 darkside y un barspin a tailwhip en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen Superman, einen 360 Darkside und einen Barspin zu Tailwhip.
description.russian: Сделать супермен, 360 + дарксайд и барспин на тейлвип за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a double backflip, a backflip cliffhanger and an oppo 360 tailwhip in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un double backflip, un backflip cliffhanger et unn oppo 360 tailwhip en un run
description.spanish: Haz un double backflip, un backflip cliffhanger y un oppo 360 tailwhip en una carrera.
description.german: Abs. in einer Fahrt einen Double Backflip, einen Backflip Cliffhanger und einen Oppo 360 Tailwhip
description.russian: Сделать двойное сальто назад, сальто назад + скалолаз и оппозит 360 + тейлвип за 1 заезд.

description.english: Complete 50 runs with gold / yellow pedals.
description.german: Schließe 50 Fahrten mit goldenen/gelben Pedalen ab
description.french: Terminez 50 runs avec des pédales en or / jaunes
description.spanish: Completa 50 carreras con pedales de oro / amarillos.
description.russian: Выполнить 50 заездов с золотыми / желтыми педалями.

description.english: Do a 360 darkside, oppo 360 turndown and barspin to turndown in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un 360 darkside, un oppo 360 turndown et un barspin to turndown en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un 360 darkside, un oppo 360 turndown y un barspin a turndown en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen 360 Darkside, einen Oppo 360 Turndown und einen Barspin zu Turndown
description.russian: Сделать 360 + дарксайд, оппозит 360 + терндаун и барспин на терндаун за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a 360 table, nac-nac and a kickout to table in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un 360 table, un nac-nac et un kickout to table en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un 360 table, un nac-nac y un kickout a table en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen 360 Table, einen Nac-Nac und einen Kickout zu Table.
description.russian: Сделать 360 + тейбл, нак-нак и выброс на тейбл за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a 360 turndown, 360 table and a no foot can in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un 360 turndown, un 360 table et un no foot can en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un 360 turndown, un 360 table y un no foot can en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen 360 Turndown, einen 360 Table und einen No Foot Can.
description.russian: Сделать 360 + терндаун, 360 + тейбл и канкан без ног за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a tailwhip to turndown, tailwhip to 50-50 and a cannonball to barspin in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un tailwhip to turndown, un tailwhip to 50-50 et un cannonball to barspin en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un tailwhip a turndown, un tailwhip a 50-50 y un cannonball a barspin en una carrera.
description.german: Abs. in einer Fahrt e. Tailwhip zu Turndown, e. Tailwhip zu 50-50 und e. Cannonball zu Barspin.
description.russian: Сделать тейлвип на терндаун, тейлвип на 50-50 и пушечное ядро на барспин за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a no hander to toboggan, manual to 360 and a pendulum in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un no hander to toboggan, un manual to 360 et un pendulum en un run
description.spanish: Haz un no hander a toboggan, un manual a 360 y un pendulum en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen No Hander zu Toboggan, einen Manual zu 360 und einen Pendulum
description.russian: Сделать ноухенд на тобогган, баланс на 360 и маятник за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a no hander, a superman and a darkside in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un no hander, un superman et un darkside en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un no hander, un superman y un darkside en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen No Hander, einen Superman und einen Darkside.
description.russian: Сделать ноухенд, супермен и дарксайд за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a frontflip turndown, double backflip no hander and a frontflip tailwhip in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un frontflip turndown, un double backflip no hander et un frontflip tailwhip en un run.
description.spanish: Haz un frontflip turndown, un double backflip no hander y un frontflip tailwhip en una carrera.
description.german: Abs. in einer Fahrt e. Frontflip Turndown, e. Double Backflip No Hander und e. Frontflip Tailwhip.
description.russian: Сделать сальто вперед +терндаун, двойное сальто назад +ноухенд и сальто вперед +тейлвип за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a 360 barspin to turndown, 360 barspin to barspin and a 360 turndown to barspin in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un 360 barspin to turndown, un 360 barspin to barspin, un 360 turndown to barspin en 1 run
description.spanish: Haz un 360 barspin a turndown, un 360 barspin a barspin y un 360 turndown a barspin en una carrera.
description.german: Abs. in e. Fahrt e. 360 Barspin zu Turndown, e. 360 Barspin zu Barspin u. e. 360 Turnd. zu Barspin
description.russian: Сделать 360 + барспин на терндаун, 360 + барспин на барспин и 360 + терндаун на барспин за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do a front flip and a back flip in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un front flip et un back flip en un run
description.spanish: Haz un frontflip y un backflip en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen Frontflip und einen Backflip
description.russian: Сделать сальто вперед и сальто назад за 1 заезд.

description.english: Take 10 photos.
description.german: Nimm 10 Fotos auf
description.french: Prenez 10 photos
description.spanish: Haz 10 fotos.
description.russian: Сделать 10 снимков.

description.english: Complete all challenges in 1 level.
description.french: Terminez tous les défis du niveau 1
description.spanish: Completa todos los desafíos de un nivel.
description.german: Schließe alle Herausforderungen in einem Level ab
description.russian: Выполнить все задания 1-го уровня.

description.english: Do a manual and a 360 spin in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un manual et une rotation 360 en un run
description.spanish: Haz un manual y un 360 spin en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen Manual und eine 360 Drehung
description.russian: Сделать баланс и 360 + вращение за 1 заезд.

description.english: Create a custom bike.
description.french: Créez un vélo personnalisé
description.spanish: Crea una bici personalizada
description.german: Erstelle ein individuelles Bike
description.russian: Собрать свой велосипед.

description.english: Ring the bell a total of 5 times.
description.german: Triff insgesamt 5 Mal die Glocke
description.french: Faites retentir la cloche 5 fois en tout
description.spanish: Haz sonar la campana 5 veces en total
description.russian: Позвонить в колокол 5 раз.

description.english: Do a Racer and a Boost in one run.
description.french: Exécutez un racer et un boost en un run
description.spanish: Haz un racer y un boost en una carrera.
description.german: Absolviere in einer Fahrt einen Racer und einen Boost
description.russian: Сделать рейсер и буст за 1 заезд.

description.english: Do triple front flip table to one hand table to no hander.
description.french: Exécutez un triple front flip table to one hand table to no hander
description.spanish: Haz un triple frontflip table a one hand table a no hander.
description.german: Absolviere einen Triple Frontflip Table zu One Hand Table zu No Hander
description.russian: Сделать тройное сальто вперед + тейбл на однорукий тейбл на ноухенд.

description.english: Do an oppo-spin 1440 barspin.
description.french: Exécutez un oppo-spin 1440 barspin
description.spanish: Haz un oppo-spin 1440 barspin.
description.german: Absolviere einen Oppo-Drehung 1440 Barspin
description.russian: Сделать оппозит спин + 1440 + барспин.

description.english: Do 3 tricks from each trick set in one level.
description.french: Exécutez 3 tricks de chaque ensemble en un niveau
description.spanish: Haz 3 trucos de cada conjunto de trucos en un nivel.
description.german: Absolviere in einem Level 3 Tricks aus jedem Trick-Set
description.russian: Сделать 3 трюка с каждого набора трюков на одном уровне.

description.english: Do a backflip cliffhanger to backflip deadhanger to backflip decade.
description.french: Exécutez un backflip cliffhanger to backflip deadhanger to backflip decade
description.spanish: Haz un backflip cliffhanger a backflip deadhanger a backflip decade.
description.german: Absolviere einen Backflip Cliffhanger zu Backflip Deadhanger zu Backflip Decade
description.russian: Сделать сальто назад + скалолаз на сальто назад + висельника на сальто назад + дикейд.

description.english: Complete all challenges in 1 world.
description.french: Terminez tous les défis dans 1 monde
description.spanish: Completa todos los desafíos de un mundo.
description.german: Schließe alle Herausforderungen in einer Welt ab
description.russian: Выполнить все задания 1-го мира.

description.english: Complete 360 challenges.
description.german: Schließe 360 Herausforderungen ab
description.french: Terminez 360 défis
description.spanish: Completa 360 desafíos.
description.russian: Выполнить все задания с 360.

description.english: Complete all 720 challenges
description.german: Schließe alle 720 Herausforderungen ab
description.french: Terminez les 720 défis
description.spanish: Completa los 720 desafíos.
description.russian: Выполнить все задания с 720.
